text: Empa ba bang ba Ma-Arabia a mahoatata ba lumela ho Allah le letsatsing la bofelo, ba bile ba shalima litefelo tsa bona, e le limpho tse hloekileng, tse bileng liba atametsang ho Allah le hóna ho fumana lithapello tsa moromuoa. E, Ruri tsena li ba atameletsa pel’a Hae. Haufinyana Allah U tla ba amohella mohaung oa Hae. Hobane Allah U ts’oarela-khafetsa, U mohau-O-fetisisang
